Text.Page: Unless you have a piece of eldritch leather squirreled away somewhere, don't even ask. I can't make the top hats without the leather, and you can't get the leather anywhere.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I have the leather."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Wow, you actually had some?

Well, okay, then! What spectacular hat fits you best?"Let me see your selection."
If you need eldritch leather, you're out of luck. Trust me, just dump your bloodhide and rough hide on the market, and cut your losses.
